title: New: Kid Trench – I’ll Be Waiting
content:
Having made his debut on CitR little under a month ago, Belfast’s Kid Trench is back with another lovelorn ballad.

I’ll Be Waiting follows in a similar vein to Blue Skies, slightly cheesy, slightly brilliant, falling somewhere in between. With little info available on his identity, these two tracks are all we have to go on for the time being.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
